posts.post_content:
I had to sell most of my small collection of T206 cards a couple of years ago, but now have been slowly re-acquiring as I can.

I collect lower grade T206 cards (Fair range) that have generally good appeal (can have some paper missing on back and possibly small amount on front.

Looking for a Hooks Wiltse portrait with cap card, any brand back, in the $15 range. 

Also would like to acquire a Tolstoi back card, just about any player in the Fair $15 range would be fine, as I don't have a Tolstoi back in my collection.

I understand that the Wiltse card that I am looking for also came in a Tolstoi back, so that would be great and would "kill two birds with one stone," so to speak.

Thank you all in advance.
